enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require similar parameters such as 'asset' and 'amount', which can be reused for setting up the test environment.
Both methods involve asset transactions and can share similar parameter setups like 'startTime' and 'endTime'.
The 'queryUniversalTransfer' method returns transfer history, which can be used to verify the results of the 'universalTransfer' method.
The 'accountSnapshot' method provides account balance snapshots, which can be used to verify the asset transfer effects of the 'universalTransfer' method.
